Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: HR // EN Prodaje se kuća ukupne površine oko 1000 m2 (cca 700 m2 stambene površine) s poslovnim i stambenim prostorima, u samom centru Novske - Zagreb 100 km, Sisak 70 km, Kutina 30 km. U prizemlju kuće je lokal koji trenutno radi kao cafe bar – oko 105 m2 (opremljen suvremenom klimatizacijom), pripadajuća natkrivena terasa oko 50m2, plus nova kuhinja koja omogućuje otvaranje restorana, te skladišni i uredski prostori. Iznad lokala je stambeni prostor na dvije etaže. S dvorišne strane je krilo kuće sa sobama spremnim za izdavanje kao prenoćište, te recepcija, a pored kuće dograđen je manji samostojeći objekt oko 30 m2, pogodan za trgovinu ili neki drugi obrt. Ispred kuće nalazi se privatni parking sa 7 parkirnih mjesta. U neposrednoj blizini: pošta, banka, dječji vrtić, osnovna škola, supermarketi, gradska tržnica, dom zdravlja, ... Kuća je adaptirana 2014. godine – krovište, toplinska izolacija i PVC stolarija. Sve je u potpunosti legalizirano. Cijena: moguć dogovor. Upiti na  +385 91 9035358 ili +385 91 5018823 ili na email: seadeta.sheherezade@gmail.com *** A house for sale: - Ground floor consists of a cafe/restaurant with kitchen, covered terrace, warehouse, office, courtyard, additional business space suitable for a small shop, fast food, etc. - First floor consists of 9 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms, one kitchen: rooms 5 bedrooms situated in a special wing of the house as they were a part of Bed & Breakfast and are equipped accordingly. - Attic consists of one large bedroom and a bathroom-` this was also a part of the Bed & Breakfast, plus an attic storage - There are 7 parking spaces in front of the house belonging to the estate - The house is situated in the very center of Novska Town - cca 100 km from Zagreb, 70 km from Sisak, 30 km from Kutina. - The house is ready for use: heating system gas, and electricity; restaurant has its own ventilation and A/C system; the facade, PVC windows, roof  ` all renewed in 2014. - The house can be a family home, plus offers possibility for developing own in-house business. Post office, bank, kindergarten, open market, supermarkets, elementary school, local medical center, high school - all within walking distance.
